title: Hezekiah’s Trial and God’s Deliverance
summary: Sennacherib of Assyria invades Judah. Hezekiah strengthens Jerusalem’s defenses and trusts God. The prophet Isaiah encourages the people. God sends an angel to destroy the Assyrian army. Later, Hezekiah becomes sick, is healed, but briefly becomes proud.

faq.question: How did God save Jerusalem from Assyria?
faq.answer: He sent an angel who struck down the Assyrian army overnight.

faq.question: What lesson did Hezekiah learn after his illness?
faq.answer: That pride must be replaced with humility before God.
